credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Design for a Cruet Stand
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and wash on paper
description: Two glass bottles with handles and chained stoppers stand in a tub-shaped stand with fluted feet. The stand is decorated with cut out lozenge ornaments. The handle of the stand in middle with an upside down triangular-shaped handle, and fluted feet. The drawing has been folded.
name: Drawing
